title: A Level Sociology - Observation
description: Liz looks at observation as a research method for your A Level Sociology exam. In this episode, she will look at participant observation and non-participant observation. Ideal for preparing for your A Level Sociology exam. For more info visit www.senecalearning.com
dc:creator: Seneca Learning Revision
